Another new food… Reuben pickle dog. Pickle, sauerkraut, thousands island dressing, cream cheese, wrapped in pastrami. To be honest, we were skeptical, but it was very good!

Another new food… Reuben pickle dog. Pickle, sauerkraut, thousands island dressing, cream cheese, wrapped in pastrami. To be honest, we were skeptical, but it was very good!
